extendedInfo.description: With tons of crazy colors; create and care beautiful baby fishes. Donât let your fish to grow out of colors. So tap fish to feed them with symphony of colors. This clean and focused kid coloring app is designed such that it is inviting and nourishing for those kids who love aquatic life.The color selection and the art of coloring with unique color effects play a distinct role in the development of cognitive, tactile and fine motor skills of your pre-school kid. We have replaced the old method of tap and paint; with the new and improved finger drawing technique.You might be thinking whatâs so good about this app? This coloring app *Features*â Choose from 3 sizes of basic coloring tool brush for your kid painting art skillsâ¬ of color touch effectsâ Use the free tool eraser to rub off the unwanted color flashlightâ¬ from the pictureâ Let your child grow his creative instincts through this fun game with 20 multi color brushes from a range of colors and unique designs.â While your child play around with this interactive touching coloring book, a distraction-free music plays behind to boost up his  creative thoughtsâ You have messed up and donât feel like erasing it all? Press CLEAR ALL and the app do the cleaning job itself.â¬â We have replaced the old method of tap and paint; with the new and improved finger painting technique. Swipe across the screen where you want to color while the-machine-fills it for you. â Save the flashing sketch your fun brain kid has colored, to the SD card/Gallery ***Now you must be wondering how you can play it***â Scroll down the images to select one of your choiceâ You can view it now on your coloring screen/coloring spaceâ Select a suitable colorâ Now color the image carefullyâ Save the image to your SD Card/Phone Memory or Image Gallery when you are doneWhat are you waiting for? You are just taps away from exotic tropical plants, sea reefs, killer whales and terrifying sharks. So upload it on your device now to enjoy this kid coloring delightful game. Tell us about your experiences and suggestions to help us keep working on more teaching apps for kids.â¨***DISCLAIMER***â This free app is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and/or home screen.

reviews.title: Unrealistic ad pushes.  Just terrible.
reviews.comment: Imagine trying to color with your two year old and mysteriously a browser opens and pushes another app\'s ad every few seconds.  Such a disappointment. One star for terrible experience because it is unusable.
reviews.author: A Google User
